```{r}
library(readr)

currency <- exData2$"幣別"
exchangeRate <- exData2$"匯率"
```
```{r}

```
```{r}
head(date)
```
```{r}
library(lubridate)

```
```{r}
class(date)
```
```{r}
isafter19800801 <- 
  date >= ymd("1980-08-01")
sum(isafter19800801)
```

```{r}

  is.na(exchangeRate)

```

```{r}
is.na(exchangeRate)
```
